plays.text: Penalty to Matthew Lombardi 2  minutes for Unsportsmanlike conduct
Penalty to Jared Boll 5  minutes for Fighting (maj)

Penalty to Oliver Ekman-Larsson 2  minutes for Holding the stick
Penalty to Fedor Tyutin 2  minutes for Hooking
Penalty to Tim Erixon 2  minutes for Cross checking

Shootout attempt   by Mikkel Boedker  MISSES

Shootout attempt  by Oliver Ekman-Larsson saved by Sergei Bobrovsky
